section.name: Welcome to Hippo ECM
section.p: Hippo ECM is an open source enterprise content management solution. It's targeted at medium to large organisations managing content for multi-channel distribution like web sites and intranets. It facilitates an open and flexible way of using your information by following international accepted open standards.

subsection.name: Learning about Hippo ECM
subsection.p: This site is separated into the following sections, depending on how you'd like to use Hippo ECM:

li.p: Information for those who need to get a standard Hippo ECM up and running.
Information for those who need to work with a Hippo ECM system.
Information for developers of Hippo ECM add-ons.
Integrate Hippo ECM in an existing environment.

subsection.name: How to get support
subsection.p: Support for Hippo ECM is available in a variety of different forms.
To get started, search the documentation, the wiki, issue tracker, or the mailing list archives to see if the problem has been solved or reported before.

If the problem has not been reported before, the recommended way to get help is to subscribe to the Hippo ECM Users Mailing list. Many other users and Hippo ECM developers will answer your questions there, and the answer will be archived for others in the future.
Commercial support is provided by Hippo.
